It absorbs the smell and doesn't leak through. Our dogs are drawn to it and know what to do, and don't seem to care to do it anywhere else in the house when there's a pee pad out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These have changed!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 16 yo male cat who frequently misses the litter box. I started using these a couple of years ago and they were a life saver. What a wonderful relief not to have to spend time cleaning up messes! I would have given them 5 stars if I had written a review then. But the most recent batch I got is different. The pads were folded differently and are noticeably thinner. And they LEAK! Leakage was never a problem with the old ones, but these very often soak right through. I guess I'll have to switch to the heavy duty ones, but that's a pretty big price jump. I'm going to search elsewhere for a better deal.
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: Sufficient
customer_reviews.text: I love these puppy pads. Sure they aren’t huge but it doesn’t matter. It works very well. My dogs are pad trained, but I use these when they come back inside from being outside with wet feet. Absorbs great.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Great for soaking through to the floor
customer_reviews.text: These pee pads soak through every single time. Unless you have the tiniest puppy that will pee the smallest dime sized amount of pee, it will definitely soak through to the floor. It's totally worth it getting a better brand that costs a bit more because these ones were the worst to use. We had 100 and it felt like a waste to not use them so we powered through them all and we're finally done with them. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Yodaman

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: I have tired many brands of pads petsmart, bjs etc and they all leaked through and gave off a nasty smell. I really like these pads they hold a lot don’t leak through and retain that nasty dog pee smell. I would recommend these. I have a lab
customer_reviews.author: Lorena

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for a medium sized dog
customer_reviews.text: The price is right but the pads leaked. I have a Yorkie mix & had to shampoo the carpet everytime he used these. I've switched to another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: Works great on a rainy day
customer_reviews.text: Whenever it’s raining out my pup will not do his business in the rain. So he goes on the pads in the house. It’s very easy to clean it up just by rolling it up in the pad and throw it out. Works every time. Never leaks through. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Retta

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, leaky junk!
customer_reviews.text: These were comparable to pricier pet store brands when I started buying them about 6 months ago. But the last box was obviously reduced quality and absolutely pointless because every tiny urine puddle from my 4 lb teacup leaked straight through to the floor! It’s also a huge negative because it’s reversing the potty training of my dog since he doesn’t want to pee and have it run all over the floor he’s got to run through to get off the pad! Terrible! I’m sending this cheap junk BACK! Hate when I find a decent product, put it on autoship then someone needs to make six more cents profit and bungles up the whole thing.
customer_reviews.author: ZenFriend

customer_reviews.title: Absorbent Pads Save Time
customer_reviews.text: We use the pads to make cleaning urine on a concrete floor faster and easier than newspaper, which is slow to absorb and results in messy black ink smears on hands and gloves. Our 16 year old dog frequently has to pee and when the weather is rainy or cold we keep the dog door shut, so she pees on the concrete floor. These pee pads are absorbent and make cleanups easier. Our dog is on the small side so we cut each pad into 4 pieces, so instead of wasting a whole pad on a small pee, we get 4X use.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Wong

customer_reviews.title: AmazonBasics Pet Training
customer_reviews.text: Got a puppy pooping and peeing all over the floor of your home? That's what these are for. Incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Derek S.

customer_reviews.title: Absorbent pad!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Was worried because it was one of the cheaper items so I thought it would definitely leak but it’s held up so far for the last couple of months for our maltipoo puppy. Not sure if it would still be like that for larger breed dog.
customer_reviews.author: Margrethe Chua

customer_reviews.title: Soaks up the mess without leaking
customer_reviews.text: I have a few puppies learning to potty train. I work during the day and the puppies use the pads. I havent had any of the pads leak through to the floor at all.
customer_reviews.author: Zaina

customer_reviews.title: Good deal!
customer_reviews.text: Best deal I can find. Price and amount of pads is wonderful !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product isnt bad works fairly well I would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Our dog has a weak bladder sure to save accidents when we’re not here they do pretty good absorbing as long as she hits the mark they could be a little wider other than that I’m pretty pleased with this product my dog is medium sized lab
customer_reviews.author: Tim Morris Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Works well even with 2 dogs.
customer_reviews.text: I have a pitbull and a chihuahua. They are both older and can't hold their bladders so we decided to try these pads. They are the perfect size and very absorbent.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Doughtie

customer_reviews.title: Gave A Second Chance - Glad I Did!
customer_reviews.text: When I used the first couple of pads, they did not protect the floor as I'd hoped. But Sophie was insistent in using the floor as her preferred potty spot that I decided to give them another try. I'm glad I did. Maybe the first few were defective; but since then, I've had no trouble. You can see in the first picture the urine spot. I lifted the pad to expose the floor underneath so you can see the dry floor that was beneath that pad. I'm happy to report that Sophie has learned how to use the pads - they really do work. I just purchased a second box also.
customer_reviews.author: FlyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Good stand by product
customer_reviews.text: Our puppy is pretty much housebroken now but we have these stationed when we have to leave her for longer periods than usual. They work fine even for a medium sized dog.
customer_reviews.author: D. Yoshimura

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I have problems with one of my legs and can't walk a lot. So these pads are great for my dog to be able to use.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn F Hight

customer_reviews.title: Amazon has done it again
customer_reviews.text: Amazonbasics is becoming a household name for my family. From clothing and drawer pulls to now training pads. Since our local box store stopped carrying training pads, I've been forced to find an alternative online. My first few trials...didn't work out so well. But I've had nothing but great luck with Amazonbasics. The quality is at a much higher standard than similar offerings at the same price. The pads. also work well for small paint projects. I've found them handy to have around, even if it isn't for the dog. Pros: - Amazon Guarantee - Product Quality - Competitive Pricing Cons: - You still have to clean up after your dog
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Stewart Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Always Buy These
customer_reviews.text: Great pads for the price; I always order the 150 ct and have for years
customer_reviews.author: dreamer09

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I have an older dog and having health issues myself, we have these set up in the garage so we no longer go outside in the rain or late at night. They work well, are very absorbent, and are a great price. They make our life just that bit easier.
customer_reviews.author: RJR

customer_reviews.title: No leaks - great price
customer_reviews.text: These pads are great! I use them with 3 ferrets & if you know anything about ferrets - they go pee a lot!! These pads have never leaked & they are a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Best 10 lbs & under
customer_reviews.text: These pads work best for my dogs under 10 lbs and allows them to use the same pad multiple times. I use these pads inside a large enough litter box.
customer_reviews.author: K. Baba

customer_reviews.title: Consistently different every time I order..
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews, but I ALWAYS read them, and order based off of them, hence why I feel obligated to write this.. I have been using puppy pads for years, and I've purchased these specifically numerous times, they are NOT consistent. They are always different sizes, and thicknesses.. It's very frustrating.. Writing this review so hopefully Amazon will fix it.. but, if you need puppy pads, like I do, these will work.. They're the best I've found, when they're what they're supposed to be..just wish they were consistent!!
customer_reviews.author: Mendi

customer_reviews.title: I just wish the sheets were larger
customer_reviews.text: I use these pad for a rabbit. If he is sitting out on by bed, I like the protection this product provides. I made this purchase back in 2018, and I found the pads a little small. I am hoping, different size pads are available now. I bought some cheaper pads elsewhere and the quality was lower. For some reason, I did not think quality would be an issue. In reality, quality is a big factor in keeping you home clean of pet mistakes and messes.
customer_reviews.author: Goldymundo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality Pet Pads
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pee pads for potty training! The Amazon pads are far superior in quality to the pads that we bought at the big box store, wbich my puppy kept tearing up. My puppy immediately went over to the Amazon pee pad and began sniffing around the edge and made use of the pad. I am very pleased with the quality of the pad and my puppy seems to be drawn to use the pads. I highly recommend the Amazon pet pads!
customer_reviews.author: 1SandrainSF

customer_reviews.title: Good size and amount for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I dont like is that the top doesn't dry as fast as some other pads and the backing seems to tear very easily when dogs are walking on them.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive measurement
customer_reviews.text: Description states that it’s 22 x 22 it’s actually 21 1/2 x 21 1/2 which means that most puppy pad holders out there will not fit this. Does not have any sticky edges to help stick to the ground it’s completely worthless if your animal instinctively scratches at the place that they have just defecated on because it will be destroyed immediately or will fold over and it will leak urine if it’s not flat to the ground
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Same or better then the Name Brands
customer_reviews.text: We have used name brand pads for our older dog, and she soaks through them. These absorb and retain the liguid without soak through. For less money!
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these pads a couple of months ago and they were great so I ordered again. These are definitely NOT the same as the last order. The puppy pee goes right through the pad. Zero absorbency. Have to double up when we use them. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: laurae80
